overview: When Eva's principal tells her to visit a student at home she knows, because of her past history of sl--ping with students, she better be careful. But once she gets a look at the huge boner her studen has, all rules go out the window. Sam is visiting Siya to learn Russian, but Siya has confused him with another young man she's met on a dating app. Sam thought he would be brushing up on the Russian language but all Siya wants to work on is her body language! Tony can't believe it when he realizes that his hot and busty teacher is a cam girl on the side. Tony realizes that he may be able to benefit from his discovery, so he goes to Miss KArter's house to confront her and to see what develops. Alison invites her student over for a study session but he's distracted by her cleavage. She offers to show him even more. He can't help but pop a boner, which embarasses him but Alison says that it's her fault and since she started it, she would finish it.
title: Teacher Fucks Teens 7
